Contact

Life is busy, and it is all too easy to become remote from the natural world that we are so much a part of. Let's reconnect. Share stories of the day's adventures over sundown drinks and a campfire, as days quickly transform into star-filled nights, heralded by an orchestra of night sounds. Send me an email; let's organize a Kruger Wildlife Safari.

You can also organise a call on Zoom or Skype, if you would like to have more information on a specific safari.

Email: bushbap@gmail.com

Contact

  • Cell: +351 964 872 495
  • Email: bushbap@gmail.com
  • Office Hours: Mon-Fri, 08:00-17:00
